vsParam:
Hop, you're not as fast as before!
You have got to improve yourself!

Got it, Anego!
I'll try harder! Oh!!

Um... You're pulling out uni's thorns one by one...
Is this some ritual unique to the Fairyland?

No!
I'm training Hop to turn him into a top-ranking fairy!
I'm receiving training to be a top-ranking fairy!

Ah, really...
You two remind me of Tandrion and Cresson...

No no, don't you dare compare us to them!
Come on, Hop! Let's move into the next training!

The next training for you is to catch 5 Punis!
Anyway, go get 5 Punis!

What? 5 Punis!?
Isn't it too hard for me...

Er, really? Um... Fine.
[px], help Hop.

No why! Just help him. Hop is in trouble, OK? Are you
going to turn a blind eye to a fairy in trouble, [px]? Huh?

Oh, I knew you won't turn a blind eye to a fairy in trouble...
Good for you, [px]! Yay~ You're awesome!

No, I think you're the one who put him in trouble...
(Sigh) Forget it.

Hop, we'll help you kill Punis.
... Or it'll be too hard for you.

Oh, really!?
Thank you so much!

I will kill one with my own strength and willpower!
Um... About the other four... Please help me kill them!!

So, you're largely counting on us!? Alright, it's OK.
But it doesn't feel right somehow...
